doc:
Michael Kitchen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Kitchen 0 Michael Roy Kitchen (born 31 October 1948) is an English actor and television producer, best known for his role as Detective Chief Superintendent Christopher Foyle in the ITV drama series Foyle's War 2002-15. He also played the role of Bill Tanner in two James Bond films and John Farrow in BBC Four's comedy series Brian Pern. Michael_Roy_Kitchen ( born 31_October_1948 ) is an_English_actor_and_television_producer , best_known for his_role as Detective_Chief_Superintendent_Christopher_Foyle in the_ITV_drama_series_Foyle 's_War_2002-15 . He also played the_role of Bill_Tanner in two_James_Bond_films and John_Farrow in BBC_Four 's_comedy_series_Brian_Pern .
